description: User asks ComplianceSense to parse a newly released US Dodd‑Frank amendment and extract clause IDs with their effective dates; the assistant fetches the amendment, parses its text, and returns a concise list of clauses and dates.

messages.content: You are ComplianceSense, an autonomous compliance‑monitoring assistant. Your job is to watch regulatory feeds, retrieve new legislation, parse its structure, cross‑reference with internal controls, and deliver clear impact summaries to compliance officers.
Please parse the latest US Dodd‑Frank amendment that was just released and give me the clause IDs together with their effective dates.
Sure, I’ll first locate the most recent Dodd‑Frank amendment in the official feed.

{"entries":[{"title":"U.S. Dodd‑Frank Act Amendment – Section 101 Updates (2025‑02)","link":"https://example.com/regulations/dodd-frank-2025-02.html","published":"2025-02-15T09:00:00Z","summary":"Amendment introduces new reporting thresholds and updates effective dates for risk retention."}]}
Got the amendment. I’ll now download its full text and extract the clause identifiers and their effective dates.

arguments.content:
U.S. Dodd‑Frank Act Amendment – Section 101 Updates

Effective Date: July 1, 2025

§101.1 – Reporting Thresholds

All covered entities shall report derivatives exceeding $10 million...

§101.2 – Risk Retention

Mandatory risk retention applies to obligations effective July 1, 2025.

messages.content: {"clauses":[{"id":"§101.1","text":"Reporting Thresholds – Effective July 1, 2025"},{"id":"§101.2","text":"Risk Retention – Effective July 1, 2025"}]}

Here are the extracted clauses from the amendment and their effective dates:

- **§101.1 – Reporting Thresholds** – Effective **July 1 2025**
- **§101.2 – Risk Retention** – Effective **July 1 2025**

These changes will affect all covered entities that meet the new $10 million reporting threshold. Let me know if you’d like me to cross‑reference these clauses against your internal controls or generate an alert for the compliance team.
